resources.string: Taking the pain out of campaigns
Please enter a secure, memorable password

We are sophomores at TJHSST! Our mobile app is called capConnect. We created this app using Android Studios, Elasticsearch and Flask. The Phone2Action Legislator API was also used. The main programming languages we used are Java and Python.
Visit this link for more information on our website: http://capconnectonline.org
Please enter a detailed description. This will be what potential volunteers will see when they view your campaign
Please enter a category for your campaign (eg. Environmental)
Please enter a slogan (eg. Nike - Just do it)
Catchy Name for your Campagin (Ex. Go Green!)
Congrats! You\'ve finished the process. Now users can view your campaign. Check and edit in \'My Campaigns\'
